result.html: An bhfuil Siobhán istighIs Siobhán in?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil Sioḃán istiġIs Siobhán in?

result.eng: Which of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó SiobhánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sine tusa nó SioḃánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?

result.html: Is í Siobhán is sineSiobhán is the oldest.
result.ponchtml: Is í Sioḃán is sineSiobhán is the oldest.

result.html: Mise SiobhánI'm Siobhán.
result.ponchtml: Mise SioḃánI'm Siobhán.

result.eng: Goodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
result.ga: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.orig: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.html: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárachGoodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Slán leat a Ṡioḃán Beiḋ mé ag caint leat amáraċGoodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
